channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Life360 adds a new no-show notification to its app
item.description: Life360 has launched a new no-show notification to alert family members when you don't reach a location at a designated time.

item.title: 9 Best Planners of 2025: Weekly, Daily, and Monthly
item.description: Digital tools are not always superior. Here are some WIRED-tested agendas and notebooks to keep you on track.

item.title: The Best Cold-Plunge Pools in 2025—I Spent Months Testing to Find the Best
item.description: Keen to try the latest wellness trend, I dipped out of my comfort zone. These are my favorite cold-water-plunge pools for any budget.

item.title: Scientists Just Caught Human Embryo Implantation on Camera

item.title: FieldAI raises $405M to build universal robot brains
item.description: FieldAI builds foundational AI models that help all kinds of robots learn and adapt to new environments using physics.

item.title: Arkansas Hosts the Planet’s Only Public Diamond Mine
item.description: Visitors have unearthed over 35,000 diamonds at Crater of Diamonds State Park since 1972.

item.title: Dex is an AI-powered camera device that helps children learn new languages
item.description: A new gadget called Dex allows kids to take pictures of objects and the AI translates the word into different languages.
